Dia dhuit, a dhomhain!	dʲiə ɣitʲ a ɣoːaɴʲ
cas	kˠasˠ
fan	fˠaɴˠ
tar	tˠaɾˠ
# TODO: a, ai, or ea before ll, m, nn, or rr  am, caill, fearr, gearr
# TODO: a, or ai before rd, rl, rn    ard, tharla, tairne
gá	gˠaː
bá	bˠaː
pá	pˠaː
adharc	aiaɾˠkˠ
eidhneán	aiɴˠaːɴˠ
aidhm	aimʲ
meicneoir	mʲecɴʲoːiɾʲ
éan	eːɴˠ
beidh	bʲei
